PHRASE.LANG: Lorsque vous parlez de votre collection, utilisez des termes comme "fort astringent", "rond en bouche", "intense et fruité", sans oublier le très populaire "musqué". Les gens croiront que vous êtes un connaisseur. [#Legal]

When talking about your collection, use terms like, "full-bodied taste," "refreshing finish," "intense and layered," and, of course, the ever-popular "nuanced character." People will believe you're a connoisseur. [#Legal]
